content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains general information on elections and automatic increases pending on the date of death, including
elections not acted upon at time of death
election of disability compensation in lieu of retired pay
, and
automatic increases not affected prior to death
.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A  - Entitlement to Accrued Benefits Under 38 U.S.C. 5121
citation: Part XI, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section A
